channel.description: Super firm tofu Rough chop tofu Marinade: 2 Tbsp soy sauce 2 Tbsp Nooch 1 tsp chilli powder 1/2 tsp garlic powder 1/2 tsp onion powder 1/2 tsp smoked paprika or chipotle powder 1/2 tsp cumin 1/2 tsp oregano 1/4 tsp ground coriander 1 tbsp taco bell hot sauce 2 tbsp vegan mayo 1 tbsp water Mix and blend marinade ingredients Add in chopped tofu and mix let it sit for 30 minutes
